description: This file contains data model classes for a restaurant frontend application, defining structures such as menu categories, items, cart items, reservations, and orders.

classes.name: MenuCategory
classes.description: Represents a category in the menu with an ID, name, and icon.

classes.name: MenuItemModel
classes.description: Represents an individual menu item with details such as ID, category, name, description, price, popularity, and image URL.

classes.name: CartItem
classes.description: Represents an item added to the shopping cart with a specific quantity, including a method to calculate line total.

classes.name: Reservation
classes.description: Models a reservation with customer details, date and time, number of guests, and notes.

classes.name: Order
classes.description: Models an order with order ID, creation timestamp, list of cart items, subtotal, tax, total, and status.

methods.name: CartItem.copyWith
methods.description: Returns a copy of the CartItem with an optionally specified new quantity.

methods.name: CartItem.lineTotal
methods.description: Computed property that calculates total price for the cart item based on quantity.
